00014 #ifndef _LIGHTTPD_HANDLER_HELPERS_HPP_
00015 #define _LIGHTTPD_HANDLER_HELPERS_HPP_
00016 
00017 #include <boost/mpl/empty.hpp>
00018 #include <boost/mpl/front.hpp>
00019 #include <boost/mpl/pop_front.hpp>
00020 #include <boost/mpl/eval_if.hpp>
00021 #include <boost/mpl/identity.hpp>
00022 
00023 // Forward declarations for handlers_setter to use
00024 template < typename PluginType, typename Handler, typename HandlerList >
00025 struct handlers_setter_impl;
00026 struct handlers_setter_end;
00027 
00028 template < typename PluginType, typename HandlerList >
00029 struct handlers_setter_choose
00030 {
00031         typedef handlers_setter_impl<   PluginType,
00032                                                                         typename boost::mpl::front< HandlerList >::type,
00033                                                                         typename boost::mpl::pop_front< HandlerList >::type > type;
00034 };
00035 
00036 // calling handlers_setters type will set the hooks in p to
00037 // the appropriate functions according to HandlerList
00038 template < typename PluginType, typename HandlerList = typename PluginType::handlers >
00039 struct handlers_setter
00040 {
00041         typedef typename boost::mpl::empty< HandlerList >::type is_empty;
00042         typedef boost::mpl::identity< handlers_setter_end > handlers_setter_choose_end;
00043         typedef typename boost::mpl::eval_if<   is_empty,
00044                                                                                         handlers_setter_choose_end,
00045                                                                                         handlers_setter_choose< PluginType, HandlerList > >::type type;
00046 };
00047 
00051 template < typename PluginType, typename HandlerList >
00052 struct handlers_setter_base
00053 {
00054         typedef typename handlers_setter< PluginType, HandlerList >::type next;
00055 };
00056 
00060 struct handlers_setter_end
00061 {
00062         static void set( plugin& p ){}
00063 };
00064 
00069 template < typename PluginType, typename Handler, typename HandlerList >
00070 struct handlers_setter_impl : handlers_setter_base< PluginType, HandlerList > {};
00071 
00072 // Macro for defining interfaces for handler classes, wrapper functions for 
00073 // the calls to the appropriate handlers in class( p_d ) and metafunction
00074 // specializations of the handlers_setter_impl type.
00075 #define MAKE_HANDLER( TypedefHandle, handler_name ) \
00076         struct TypedefHandle { handler_t handler_name( connection& ); }; \
00077         template < typename PluginType, typename HandlerList > \
00078         struct handlers_setter_impl< PluginType, TypedefHandle, HandlerList > \
00079          : handlers_setter_base< PluginType, HandlerList > \
00080         { \
00081                 typedef handlers_setter_base< PluginType, HandlerList > super_type; \
00082                 static handler_t handler_wrapper( server* srv, connection* con, void* p ) \
00083                 { \
00084                         PluginType* P = reinterpret_cast< PluginType* >( p ); \
00085                         return P->handler_name( *con ); \
00086                 } \
00087                 static void set( plugin& p ) \
00088                 { \
00089                         p.handler_name = &handler_wrapper; \
00090                         super_type::next::set( p ); \
00091                 } \
00092         };
00093 
00094 #endif // _LIGHTTPD_HANDLER_HELPERS_HPP_
